songs.title: In Your World
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I'm hurting you again
Too lonely to pretend
Like everything is new
I promise you to
Blow it all away

[Chorus]
In your world
No one is crying alone
In your world
No one is dying alone

[Verse 2]
Too broken to belong
Too weak to sing along
I'll comfort you, my friend
Helping you to
Blow it all away

[Chorus]
In your world
No one is crying alone
In your world
No one is dying alone
